name: Elsword M Shadow of Luna
storyline: Elsword M: Shadow of Luna - travel across fantasy worlds together with fearless heroes. Fight against monsters and gather mystic chips. Rescue the world of this interesting Android game from destruction. Explore wild lands and mysterious dungeons. Destroy numerous monsters and defeat huge bosses. Change characters in the battles to apply unique abilities of each hero. Develop your characters, unlock new skills and think up a tactics of how to apply them.
summary: Elsword M: Shadow of Luna is an unreleased mobile game based on Elsword. The game's beta test began in South Korea on March 8, 2017, for Android OS users.
